questions.question: Considering the overall textual layout, what is the dominant color scheme employed in this product's information display?
What is the primary font style used to present the product's nutritional information, as observed in the image?
Based on the visual appearance, what is the primary type of information being conveyed by this product's labeling?
Observing the textual arrangement, what is the dominant orientation of the presented information within the product's label?
What is the background color of the rectangular area containing the product's nutritional information, as depicted in the provided image?
What is the primary method used to differentiate between major categories and subcategories of nutritional information within the label?
What is the case (uppercase or lowercase) for the primary heading title "Nutrition Facts"?
Examining the numerical data, which unit of measurement is most frequently used to express quantities related to nutritional content?
Considering the font sizes, what is the relative scale of the "Calories" value compared to other numerical values?
What is the visual style of the parentheses used to present percentages in the nutritional information?
Observing the label's design, what are the shapes used to frame and organize the various sections of information?
Considering the textual structure, is the list of nutrients displayed in a specific order based on some criteria (such as alphabetical, or importance)?
What is the relative size of the text describing the serving size in comparison to other details on the label?
Are there any visual elements employed to separate different parts of the nutritional data, besides the use of spacing?
What is the overall visual impression of the text's density within the rectangular label area?
